EmailTemplate.subject: EuroCIS 2022: Cut expensive third-party providers from your online offering with NCR
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Throughout 2020, the retail industry saw curbside pickup increase by more than 500%. NCR Freshop helps grocers implement their own ecommerce and delivery services within weeks – and without expensive third-party providers. NCR Freshop is integrated with NCR systems for an efficient set up in your store and a consistent experience across your instore and online channels. This is just one example of how NCR is uniquely positioned to provide the solutions that run your stores – from eCommerce, the back office to the front end, and from assisted checkout, self-checkout or mobile checkout. Join NCR at EuroCIS 2022 at Stand 10/A04. We’ll be showcasing how NCR is leading the way in grocery technology. EuroCIS is approaching fast, and we’re looking forward to seeing you there!
